elements.title: a conspicuous depiction of a common fly (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that many 15th- and 16th-century European paintings included a conspicuous depiction of a common fly (example pictured)?

elements.title: Sefine Shipyard (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Sefine Shipyard in Turkey built a hybrid-electric ferry for Norway?

elements.title: in 1345 and 1346 the English repeatedly defeated the French in both north and south-west France (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1345 and 1346 the English repeatedly defeated the French in both north and south-west France?

elements.title: An Informal History of the Hugos (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jo Walton's An Informal History of the Hugos, which opines that the Hugo Award has a 69-percent success rate, was itself nominated for a Hugo?

elements.title: Ham House (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Ham House contains a rare Charles I–era cabinet room, created for the display of miniature paintings?

elements.title: Game On (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the debate in "Game On" invokes the beer question?

elements.title: La Venuta (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the bonfires lit on the night of La Venuta recall the miraculous flight of the Holy House of Nazareth to Loreto?

elements.title: R. Nelson Smith (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that chemist R. Nelson Smith replaced his colleague's desk chair with a porcelain toilet?

elements.title: 航天员出差半年吃啥？127种食品、过年饺子是这三种馅 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 3位航天员太空出差都带了什么？官方首次揭秘 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 南北方将迎下半年来最冷清晨：这温度暴降程度真要冻哭 (快科技)

elements.title: 嫌银行态度差男子取500万现金 网友质疑：本人霸气回应 (快科技)

elements.title: 奇葩！男子认为“出生”谐音畜生要求改身份证 结果杯具 (快科技)
elements.contents:

elements.title: 翟志刚“飘了”！太空漫步第一人、宇宙级梗王 (快科技)
elements.contents:
今天，第二批航天员进入中国空间站后，三名航天员准备就位向地面报告时，出现了有趣一幕：
翟志刚却一下没站稳，笑着说：“我发现我飘了！哈哈哈！”随后，翟志刚“飘了”
